articles.title: The new economics of packaging
articles.summary: Packaging Gateway: The new economics of packaging. Packaging has moved from a back-end cost to a front-line business decision, reshaping margins, sustainability strategies and competitive advantage across global markets.

articles.title: Former Met chief demands Apple and Google disable stolen phones
articles.mainIdea: Former Met chief demands Apple and Google disable stolen phones
articles.summary: The Telegraph: Former Met chief demands Apple and Google disable stolen phones. A former Metropolitan Police chief has backed plans aimed at forcing Apple and Google to disable stolen smartphones.

articles.title: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations
articles.mainIdea: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations
articles.summary: AFP: Outcry follows CBS pulling program on prison key to Trump deportations. The leadership of CBS News was facing accusations of political meddling on Monday over a last-minute decision to not air a report on the notorious Salvadoran prison where US President Donald Trump has sent deported migrants.CBS, which was purchased by the Trump-linked Ellison family earlier this year, said that the prison report needed "additional reporting."
